sect1.title: License Information

RCE also makes use of various libraries which may not be covered by the EPL; for detailed information, see the file "THIRD_PARTY" in the root folder of an RCE installation. (To review this file without installing RCE, open the RCE release .zip file.)
For downloads and further information, please visit http://www.rcenvironment.de.
